sense.gloss: contacting, (making) contact, getting in touch, communication, correspondence, call, message
connection (with a train, bus, etc.), joining (a railway line, etc.), meeting
connection (between matters, incidents, etc.), relation, link
to twine, to get tangled, to get entangled, to get caught (in)
to be involved (e.g. of money in a matter), to get involved (in), to be a factor (in), to have an influence
to pick a quarrel (with), to find fault (with), to pester, to hassle
illogical jump, drawing a hasty inference (between two events), jumping to conclusions, acting rashly
logical connection, chain of reasoning, coherence, context
contacting, getting in touch, communication, call, message
to be entwined, to be involved
to intertwine, to become entangled, to get tangled (together)
to become intertwined (of matters, interests, etc.), to become connected, to become linked

r_ele.r: くうぐんれんらくしょうこう
こうほうれんらくせん

sense.gloss: to twine around, to twist around, to coil around
connecting station, station where you change
liaison group, liaison committee, liaison council
to catch and tie up, to apprehend, to arrest, to capture
to entangle, to trap, to get (something) stuck, to trip up
to brush out (e.g. dust, fur, plaque), to extract, to remove
rear gate (esp. of castle), back entrance
force attacking the rear of a castle
lumping together (things or people), treating (everyone) alike, handling indiscriminately, making sweeping generalizations, dealing with (various things) under one head
Nephila clavata (East Asian species of golden orb-weaving spider)
Argiope amoena (East Asian species of orb-weaving spider)
to lose contact with (someone), to stop communication with, to go missing, to disappear
to entwine, to twine around, to mix together
meridian (e.g. in acupuncture), channel, one of the lines connecting vital points in the body
thread of connection, chain of reasoning
mechanical doll, automaton, string puppet, marionette, person who follows orders blindly
to keep in contact (e.g. by phone, mail, etc.), to keep in touch
contact network, phone tree, contact information for relevant people (in a given organization)
ring (usu. made of ivory) attached to this waistcoat
netsuke, item attached to a netsuke
to (be able to) make contact, to (be able to) get in touch

r_ele.r: ごれんらくもうしあげます

sense.gloss: I am writing to you, I am (taking the liberty of) getting in touch with you
(connecting) passageway, accessway, walk-through, skyway, sky bridge

sdata.j: あなたは↑今夜↑↓こんや↓↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓で、↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとることができます。
sdata.e: You can get in touch with him at his home tonight.

sdata.j: あなたは↑今晩↑↓こんばん↓↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓で↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓が↑取↑↓と↓れる。
sdata.e: You can get in touch with him at his home tonight.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓になんとか↑電話↑↓でんわ↓で↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとろうとしたのですが、↑駄目↑↓だめ↓でした。
sdata.e: I tried to reach you on the phone, but I was unable to get through.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑先↑↓さき↓↑住所↑↓じゅうしょ↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えてください。
sdata.e: Please give me your permanent address.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓くださるのをお↑待↑↓ま↓ちしております。
sdata.e: I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちに↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓します。
sdata.e: I'll get in touch with you soon.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑下↑↓くだ↓さるのをお↑待↑↓ま↓ちしています。
sdata.e: I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにこちらから↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓します。
sdata.e: You'll be hearing from us soon.

sdata.j: ↑緊急↑↓きんきゅう↓↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑先↑↓さき↓は↑何↑↓なん↓↑番↑↓ばん↓ですか。
sdata.e: What is the emergency telephone number?

sdata.j: ↑緊急↑↓きんきゅう↓の↑時↑↓とき↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑代理人↑↓だいりにん↓に↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとってください。
sdata.e: In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent.

sdata.j: ↑緊急↑↓きんきゅう↓の↑際↑↓さい↓には、すぐに↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑代理人↑↓だいりにん↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓を↑取↑↓と↓って↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent right away.

sdata.j: ↑去年↑↓きょねん↓のヒットした↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓は、みんな↑人気↑↓にんき↓ドラマが↑絡↑↓から↓んでいる。
sdata.e: Last year's pop hit was set off by a serial TV drama.

sdata.j: ↑危険↑↓きけん↓な↑時↑↓とき↓には↑先生↑↓せんせい↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓を↑取↑↓と↓りなさい。
sdata.e: In a crisis, you must get in touch with your teacher.

sdata.j: ↑危↑↓あぶ↓なかったら↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓しなさい。
sdata.e: If it gets dangerous, give me a call.

sdata.j: ↑皆様↑↓みなさま↓にご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑申↑↓もう↓し↑上↑↓あ↓げます。
sdata.e: May I have your attention, please?

sdata.j: ↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓へ↑帰↑↓かえ↓ってきたら、↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとることを↑忘↑↓わす↓れるな。
sdata.e: When you return to your company, don't forget to keep in touch with me.

sdata.j: ↑会議↑↓かいぎ↓↑場内↑↓じょうない↓で↑自社↑↓じしゃ↓の↑製品↑↓せいひん↓の↑展示↑↓てんじ↓↑場↑↓じょう↓を↑設↑↓もう↓けたいとお↑考↑↓かんが↓えでしたら、↑早急↑↓そうきゅう↓にご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please let me know immediately if you would like to set up an area of the conference room for your products.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑二↑↓に↓↑十↑↓じゅう↓↑年間↑↓ねんかん↓↑絶↑↓た↓えず↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑合↑↓あ↓ってきた。
sdata.e: We have kept in constant touch for twenty years.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑問題↑↓もんだい↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓といかに↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとるかだ。
sdata.e: Our problem is how to get in touch with him.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓らに↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとったときはすでに↑遅↑↓おそ↓すぎた。
sdata.e: We were unable to make contact with them until it was too late.

sdata.j: ↑家族↑↓かぞく↓に↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓したいのですが。
sdata.e: I'd like to call my family.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓か↑見↑↓み↓つけたらすぐに↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓します。
sdata.e: As soon as we find out anything, we will contact him.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かこちらでできることがあれば、ご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓ください。
sdata.e: Be sure to get in touch with me, if there is anything I can do for you.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かあったらすぐに↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓してください。
sdata.e: If something happens, feel free to call me.

sdata.j: わたしは↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓が↑取↑↓と↓れなかった。
sdata.e: I couldn't get in touch with him.

sdata.j: ランドマークホテルに↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓してくれれば、↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓だ。
sdata.e: You can get in touch with me at Hotel Landmark.

sdata.j: より↑詳↑↓くわ↓しい↑情報↑↓じょうほう↓をお↑知↑↓し↓りになりたい↑場合↑↓ばあい↓は、ご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓ください。
sdata.e: If you would like to have further information, please contact me.

sdata.j: やっと↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓がとれた。
sdata.e: At last, we made contact with the police.

sdata.j: やっとあなたに↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓がついてよかった。
sdata.e: I'm glad I've finally caught you.

sdata.j: やってみたが、↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとることができなかった。
sdata.e: I found it impossible to get in contact with him.
